solution.text:
Value of each exterior angle \(=_{{360/j}}_^\circ\)
We know, sum of all the exterior angles in a regular polygon \(=360^\circ\)
Also, Number of sides in a regular polygon \(=\) Number of exterior angles.
Therefore, number of sides in a regular polygon with each exterior angle as \(_{{360/j}}_^\circ = \frac{360}{_{{360/j}}_}=_{j}_\)

content.text: How many sides does a regular polygon have if the value of each exterior angle is \(_{{360/j}}_^\circ\)?
